item.title: Hollywood Actor Reincarnated in a 10-Year-Old Boy?
item.description: Ryan Hammond, a 10-year-old from Oklahoma, insists he is the reincarnation of Marty Martyn, a Hollywood actor and agent who died in 1964. His vivid memories include meeting Marilyn Monroe and working in the film industry. Experts, including child psychiatrist Dr. Jim Tucker, have found his recollections remarkably accurate.

media:content.media:title: Hollywood Actor Reincarnated in a 10-Year-Old Boy?
media:content.media:description: Ryan Hammond, a 10-year-old from Oklahoma, insists he is the reincarnation of Marty Martyn, a Hollywood actor and agent who died in 1964. His vivid memories include meeting Marilyn Monroe and working in the film industry. Experts, including child psychiatrist Dr. Jim Tucker, have found his recollections remarkably accurate.

item.title: What Was In Those Trash Bags?
item.description: In May 2019, Jennifer Dulos vanished after dropping her children at school. Surveillance footage showed her estranged husband, Fotis Dulos, and his girlfriend, Michelle Troconis, discarding trash bags in Hartford. Inside were items stained with Jennifer's blood, ponchos, zip ties, gloves, and clothing—linking them to her disappearance. Fotis died by suicide in 2020; Troconis was convicted in 2024 for conspiracy to commit murder and evidence tampering. Jennifer was declared legally dead in 2023, but her body remains missing.

item.title: Chief Grant Hardin Betrayed the Oath to Protect and Serve
item.description: Grant Hardin, a former police chief, briefly escaped from prison in 2025 before being recaptured, raising concerns about prison security and oversight.

item.title: Travis Walton’s Unbelievable UFO Story
item.description: In 1975, logger Travis Walton claimed he was taken by a UFO in Arizona. He disappeared for five days before returning, sparking decades of debate over what really happened that night.

item.title: What Happened to Flight 980?
item.description: In 1985, Eastern Airlines Flight 980 crashed into the Andes Mountains, killing all 29 people on board. Decades later, mystery surrounds the wreckage and what really caused the disaster.

item.title: Anatoly Moskvin: The Man With 26 Dolls
item.description: Russian historian Anatoly Moskvin was found living with 26 preserved bodies dressed as dolls. His case shocked investigators and raised chilling questions about obsession and morality.

item.title: A Friendship Turned Fatal: The Murder of Taylor Wright
item.description: When private investigator Taylor Wright vanished, few suspected her best friend. But as evidence emerged, the truth revealed a shocking betrayal that ended in murder.

item.title: The Man with 1000 Kids: Jonathan Meijer
item.description: Jonathan Meijer, a Dutch sperm donor, is accused of fathering over 1000 children worldwide by donating under multiple aliases. His case has sparked global debate about fertility laws and ethics.

item.title: Brittany Murphy: Tragic Accident or Coverup?
item.description: In 2009, actress Brittany Murphy died suddenly at age 32. Officially ruled an accident, her death has fueled ongoing speculation and questions that remain more than a decade later.

item.title: 4 Workers Were Abducted From Burger Chef Working the Closing Shift
item.description: In 1978, four teens vanished from a Burger Chef in Speedway, Indiana. Days later, they were found murdered. Nearly 50 years on, the case remains unsolved, with many questions still unanswered.

item.title: When a Volcano Tour Turned Deadly: 2019 White Island
item.description: In December 2019, Whakaari/White Island erupted suddenly while 47 people—mostly tourists—were on the volcano. Twenty-two died, many were injured, and legal battles over tour safety continue.

item.title: The Mysterious Death of Natalie Wood
item.description: In 1981, actress Natalie Wood drowned off Catalina Island during a boat trip with Robert Wagner and Christopher Walken. Her death was ruled accidental but remains surrounded by questions.

item.title: The Disappearance of Niqui McCown
item.description: In 2001, Niqui McCown disappeared from Richmond, Indiana, just weeks before her wedding. Despite searches and leads, her case remains unsolved and her family is still seeking answers.

item.title: Christy Mirack Case Solved After 27 Years
item.description: In 1992, Christy Mirack was found murdered in Pennsylvania. For decades the case went cold, until DNA evidence identified her killer 27 years later, finally bringing her family justice.

item.title: The Disappearance of Alissa Turney
item.description: In 2001, 17-year-old Alissa Turney vanished from Phoenix, Arizona. Her sister continues to speak out, pushing for answers in a case that remains unsolved after more than two decades.

item.title: The Case of Ryan Borgwardt’s Fake Death
item.description: Ryan Borgwardt staged his own death to be with a woman he met online, leaving his family behind. The case revealed shocking deception and a double life that ended in criminal charges.

item.title: The Legal Troubles Facing Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs
item.description: After federal raids on his homes, Sean “Diddy” Combs faces multiple lawsuits, including claims from producer Rodney “Lil Rod” Jones and ex-girlfriend Cassie Ventura. Investigations are ongoing.

item.title: Alex Woodworth Found Himself Inside a Love Triangle That Turned Fatal
item.description: In 2018, Alex Woodworth was murdered in Eau Claire, Wisconsin, in a case involving a love triangle with Ezra McCandless. She was convicted of first-degree intentional homicide.

item.title: What Happened to Shanann Watts?
item.description: In 2018, Shanann Watts and her two daughters were murdered in Colorado. Her husband, Chris Watts, confessed and is serving multiple life sentences. The case drew worldwide attention.

item.title: The Disappearance of Nathaniel Holmes
item.description: In 1981, 5-year-old Nathaniel Holmes disappeared after leaving school in New Jersey. Despite decades of searching, his case remains unsolved and his family continues to seek answers.
